remarks: Relationship between a vector and the 1-dim (or 0-dim) subspace it generates.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Aug-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lspsnel5.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lspsnel5.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lspsnel5.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lspsnel5.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lspsnel5.a $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lspsnel6 $p |- ( ph -> ( X e. U <-> ( X e. V /\ ( N ` { X } ) C_ U ) ) ) $.
